name: Terrain Advantage
description: The character deals +1 DMG. (This character will permanently change its State if they take Pyro DMG or Electro DMG.)
descriptionraw: The character <color=#FFFFFFFF>deals +1 DMG</color>. (This character will permanently change its State if they take $[K103] or $[K104].)
descriptionreplaced: The character <color=#FFFFFFFF>deals +1 DMG</color>. (This character will permanently change its State if they take {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.)
